summary: HomePage hero image reference was updated to a new generated asset path, but the diff does not show the new image file being added to /assets/generated. Additional unrelated documentation/state summary updates mention admin/dashboard functionality not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: The hero image file used by the Home page is updated to the newly generated/edited asset in /assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: HomePage.tsx now references a new image path under /assets/generated, but the diff shows no added image asset file in that folder (Added files: none), so the updated hero image itself is not present/implemented in the provided changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the updated/edited hero asset (hanma-hero.dim_1600x600.png > hanma-hero-colorful.dim_1600x600.png) for the homepage hero image.
missing_requirements.reason: The HomePage is updated to use "/assets/generated/hanma-hero-colorful-food.dim_1600x600.png", which does not match the specified target filename pattern "hanma-hero-colorful.dim_1600x600.png" in the BuildRequest summary. If the intended output filename is strict, this is not implemented as specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin dashboard routing/guarding and admin UI features (e.g., new /admin route, admin dashboard link, admin guards, seeding button) described in repository summaries.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists creating a new admin dashboard as a non-goal and only requests updating the homepage hero image. The diff includes modified summary/state files describing admin/dashboard-related functionality that is not requested by REQ-1.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions "new admin dashboard route at /admin", "Admin Dashboard" link, AdminGuard, AdminProductsPage seeding button, etc.)
project_state.json (summary describes admin portal/dashboard and RBAC details)
